entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 12:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle or rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
